content.body: DerekNonGeneric: it's just an HTML linter, right? Any reason why we can't use an equivalent Node-based tool?
content.formatted_body: DerekNonGeneric: it's just an HTML linter, right? Any reason why we can't use an equivalent Node-based tool?

content.body: a quick search led me to this, for example: https://www.npmjs.com/package/html-validate
